result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

1:08 PM Prosecuting attorney Natalia J Gess in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Malinda Jean Castile in court.  Attorney Kathryn E Hayes in court for Malinda Jean Castile.  Court states case and appearances.  Atty Hayes acknowledges rec. information.  Court advises DE of charges/max penalties.  Atty Hayes stands mute.  Court enters not guilty plea(s) - to be set for TSC in about 60 days.  Bond continued.

1:20 PM Prosecuting attorney Rick C Spoentgen and intern Dan Moon in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Malinda Jean Castile in court.  Attorney Kathryn E Hayes in court for Malinda Jean Castile.  Atty Hayes states they will waive the prelim today.  DE agrees.  Court questions DE on prelim waiver/accepts/finds probable cause/binds DE over.  Atty Hayes requests ARGN be set out.  Bond continued.
Arraignment scheduled for August 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Arraignment on August 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

2:04 PM Prosecuting attorney Natalia J Gess in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Malinda Jean Castile in court.  Attorney Kathryn E Hayes in court for Malinda Jean Castile. Court cancels warrant.  Due waiver next week.
Waiver of Prelim scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Waiver of Prelim on July 25, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

9:12 AM Defendant Malinda Jean Castile not in court.  Attorney Natalia J Gess in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Kathryn E Hayes in court for Malinda Jean Castile.  Court officer Frie appears.  Atty. Hayes has no record to make.  Based on non-appearance, court authorized warrant.

1:42 PM Prosecuting attorney Emily Eklund in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Malinda Jean Castile in court.  Attorney Kathryn E Hayes in court for Malinda Jean Castile. Requests preliminary hearing.
preliminary hearing scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 09:15 am.
Return of property hearing on July 21, 2022 at 09:15 am.

1:28 PM Prosecuting attorney C. Remington McConnell in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Kathryn E Hayes in court for Malinda Jean Castile.  Court states case and appearances.  Atty Hayes states she reached out to DA's office this a.m.  DE is recovering from surgery and on meds that make her unable to drive.  Requests reset for PH.  Court won't do that w/o the DE being present.  State requests warrant but won't object to a stay for documentation to be provided re: DE's surgery/absence.  Atty Hayes she has documentation and provided that to ADA Gess this morning - she provides that to the State and then the  Court for her review.  Court reviews that documentation.  Court authorizes bench warrant but stays it to next week.  Medical docs provided back to Atty Hayes.
Return date scheduled for June 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on June 2, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Return date on May 25, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
